text:
Gini GmbH | iOS Developer | Munich, Germany | ONSITE |

https://www.gini.net/en/

You prefer playing with the latest smartphone technologies rather than with the device itself? You dream of building products so magical that users scream and cry out with astonishment? Then keep on reading!

Gini is paper invoices magically automated. By magic we mean a self learning semantics technology that extracts key data out of different format invoices. And how does that make difference - it automates the painful invoice payment, expense tracking or accounting tasks for end-users.

Please apply here: https://www.gini.net/assets/Gini_Senior_iOS_Developer.pdf
